mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY WASTE_SEQ ASC) RNUM, A.WASTE_SEQ , A.MEM_ID , B.COMM_DET_CODE_NM , A.QTY , A.FEE , TO_CHAR(A.EST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EST_DT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT , A.WASTE_ITEM , A.WASTE_STATUS FROM WASTE A LEFT JOIN COMM_DETAIL B ON A.WASTE_ITEM = B.COMM_DET_CODE WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT A.WASTE_SEQ , A.MEM_ID , A.WASTE_ITEM , (SELECT B.COMM_DET_CODE_NM FROM COMM_DETAIL B WHERE B.COMM_DET_CODE = A.WASTE_ITEM) COMM_DET_CODE_NM , A.QTY , A.FEE , A.RECYCLE_YN , A.ETC , TO_CHAR(A.EST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EST_DT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT , A.WASTE_STATUS , A.STATUS_COMMENT , C.FILE_NAME FROM WASTE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH C ON(A.ATTACH = C.GLOBAL_CODE) WHERE A.WASTE_SEQ = #{wasteSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WASTE ( WASTE_SEQ , MEM_ID , REG_DT , WASTE_ITEM , QTY , FEE , ETC , RECYCLE_YN , EST_DT , WASTE_STATUS , ATTACH ) VALUES( ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WASTE_SEQ, 9, 3))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') FROM WASTE WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = SUBSTR(WASTE_SEQ, 1, 8) ), #{memId}, SYSDATE, #{commDetCodeNm}, #{qty}, #{fee}, #{etc}, #{recycleYn}, TO_DATE(#{estDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '승인대기', #{attach} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY WASTE_SEQ ASC) RNUM, A.WASTE_SEQ , A.MEM_ID , C.MEM_NM , SUBSTR(C.ROOM_CODE, 10) AS ROOM_CODE , SUBSTR(C.ROOM_CODE, 6, 3) AS DONG_CODE , C.MEM_TELNO , B.COMM_DET_CODE_NM , A.QTY , TO_CHAR(A.EST_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD')EST_DT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REG_DT , A.WASTE_STATUS , D.FILE_NAME FROM WASTE A LEFT JOIN COMM_DETAIL B ON A.WASTE_ITEM = B.COMM_DET_CODE LEFT JOIN MEMBER C ON A.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ATTACH D ON A.ATTACH = D.GLOBAL_CODE ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT A.WASTE_SEQ , C.MEM_NM , SUBSTR(C.ROOM_CODE, 10) AS ROOM_CODE , SUBSTR(C.ROOM_CODE, 6, 3) AS DONG_CODE , C.MEM_TELNO , B.COMM_DET_CODE_NM , A.QTY , A.FEE , A.WASTE_STATUS , A.STATUS_COMMENT , TO_CHAR(A.EST_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD')EST_DT , D.FILE_NAME FROM WASTE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMM_DETAIL B ON A.WASTE_ITEM = B.COMM_DET_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER C ON A.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH D ON(A.ATTACH = D.GLOBAL_CODE) WHERE A.WASTE_SEQ = #{wasteSeq}
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WASTE_SEQ, 9, 3))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') FROM WASTE WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = SUBSTR(WASTE_SEQ, 1, 8)
SELECT waste_seq , cancel_yn , waste_status FROM waste where CANCEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT MEM_ID FROM WASTE WHERE WASTE_SEQ = #{wasteSeq}
SELECT WASTE_STATUS, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM WASTE GROUP BY WASTE_STATUS
SELECT A.WASTE_SEQ , B.COMM_DET_CODE_NM , A.QTY , A.FEE , TO_CHAR(A.EST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EST_DT FROM WASTE A LEFT JOIN COMM_DETAIL B ON A.WASTE_ITEM = B.COMM_DET_CODE WHERE A.WASTE_SEQ = #{wasteSeq}
